comment:
* Iterator that returns preceding nodes of a given node.
   * This includes the node set {root+1, start-1}, but excludes
   * all ancestors, attributes, and namespace nodes.

variables.name: _maxAncestors
variables.comment: The max ancestors, but it can grow...

variables.name: _stack
variables.comment:
* The stack of start node + ancestors up to the root of the tree,
     *  which we must avoid.

methods.name: public boolean isReverse()
methods.comment:
* True if this iterator has a reversed axis.
     *
     * @return true since this iterator is a reversed axis.

methods.name: public DTMAxisIterator cloneIterator()
methods.comment:
* Returns a deep copy of this iterator.   The cloned iterator is not reset.
     *
     * @return a deep copy of this iterator.

methods.name: public DTMAxisIterator setStartNode(int node)
methods.comment:
* Set start to END should 'close' the iterator,
     * i.e. subsequent call to next() should return END.
     *
     * @param node Sets the root of the iteration.
     *
     * @return A DTMAxisIterator set to the start of the iteration.

methods.name: public int next()
methods.comment:
* Get the next node in the iteration.
     *
     * @return The next node handle in the iteration, or END.

methods.name: public DTMAxisIterator reset()
methods.comment:
* Resets the iterator to the last start node.
     *
     * @return A DTMAxisIterator, which may or may not be the same as this
     *         iterator.
